project.description:
Launching CloVR Metagenomics Test without ORF finding with local credentials
Infant Gut metagenomic files can be downloaded at http://cb2.igs.umaryland.edu/clovr/Public_Benchmarks/CloVR-Metagenomics/InfantGutMetagenome/InfantGutMetagenome.tar.gz

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash set -e source /opt/vappio-scripts/clovrEnv.sh
vp-add-dataset -o --tag-name=clovr_metagenomics_orfs_fasta_local /mnt/user_data/metagenomic/Infant_fasta/Age100d.fasta /mnt/user_data/metagenomic/Infant_fasta/Age118d.fasta /mnt/user_data/metagenomic/Infant_fasta/Age371d.fasta /mnt/user_data/metagenomic/Infant_fasta/Age3d.fasta /mnt/user_data/metagenomic/Infant_fasta/Age413d.fasta /mnt/user_data/metagenomic/Infant_fasta/Age432d.fasta /mnt/user_data/metagenomic/Infant_fasta/Age441d.fasta /mnt/user_data/metagenomic/Infant_fasta/Age454d.fasta /mnt/user_data/metagenomic/Infant_fasta/Age6d.fasta /mnt/user_data/metagenomic/Infant_fasta/Age85d.fasta /mnt/user_data/metagenomic/Infant_fasta/Age92d.fasta /mnt/user_data/metagenomic/Infant_fasta/Age98d.fasta
vp-add-dataset -o --tag-name=clovr_metagenomics_orfs_map /mnt/user_data/metagenomic/InfantGutMetagenome.map
DATE=`date +"%m-%d-%Y-%T" | sed -e 's/:/_/g'`
vp-describe-protocols --config-from-protocol=clovr_metagenomics_noorfs \ -c input.FASTA_TAG=clovr_metagenomics_noorfs_fasta_local \ -c input.MAPPING_TAG=clovr_metagenomics_noorfs_map \ -c cluster.CLUSTER_NAME='local' \ -c cluster.CLUSTER_CREDENTIAL='local' \ -c cluster.TERMINATE_ONFINISH=false \ -c pipeline.PIPELINE_DESC="Hudson CloVR Metagenomics Noorfs Test local" \ > /tmp/$$.pipeline.conf.${DATE}
TASK_NAME=`vp-run-pipeline --print-task-name --pipeline-config /tmp/$$.pipeline.conf.${DATE} --overwrite`
if [ "$?" == "1" ]; then echo "vp-run-pipeline failed to run" exit 1 fi
vp-describe-task --name local --exit-code --block $TASK_NAME
exit $?
